ValidationRule.description: Checks for No blank End Dates on Campaigns when Status = 'Approved', 'In Progress', 'Completed' for New campaigns or if the status is changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /* System Administrator*/ OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "Completed") ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status) ), ISBLANK(EndDate) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign End Date cannot be NULL for Campaign Status = 'Approved' OR 'In Progress' OR 'Completed'
